text: The men's 5000 metres at the 2018 European Athletics Championships took place at the Olympic Stadium on 11 August.Timetable ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2018 European Athletics Championships |- |World record | |12:37.35 |Hengelo, Netherlands |31 May 2004 |- |European record | |12:49.71 |Brussels, Belgium |25 August 2000 |- |Championship record | |13:10.15 |Stuttgart, West Germany |31 August 1986 |- |World Leading | |13:01.09 |Lausanne, Switzerland |5 July 2018 |- |European Leading | |13:16.97 |Stanford, United States |3 May 2018 |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" !
